channel.title: The Chronicles of Narnia
channel.description:
Read by Chrissi Hart for her Readings from Under the Grapevine podcast.
The Chronicles of Narnia are published by Harper Trophy, A Division of Harper Collins, New York, New York. They are available for purchase here. We want to thank CS Lewis Pte. Ltd. for granting us permission to bring these wonderful stories to you. (Legal info). Per our agreement with Lewis estate, these episodes are NOT available for download.
channel.media:keywords: narnia, lews, chronicles, audio, books, reading, orthodox, church, ancientfaith, christian
channel.itunes:author: Ancient Faith Radio
channel.itunes:keywords: narnia, lews, chronicles, audio, books, reading, orthodox, church, ancientfaith, christian

Read by Chrissi Hart for her Readings from Under the Grapevine podcast.
The Chronicles of Narnia are published by Harper Trophy, A Division of Harper Collins, New York, New York. They are available for purchase here. We want to thank CS Lewis Pte. item.title: Narnia - The Lion, the Witch and the Wardrobe 1-2
item.description:

The Chronicles of Narnia are published by Harper Trophy, A Division of Harper Collins, New York, New York. They are available for purchase here. We want to thank CS Lewis Pte. Ltd. for granting us permission to bring these wonderful stories to you. (Legal info).
